CreateApplicationInstance.name: CreateApplicationInstance
CreateApplicationInstance.documentation: Creates an application instance and deploys it to a device.

CreateJobForDevices.name: CreateJobForDevices
CreateJobForDevices.documentation: Creates a job to run on a device. A job can update a device's software or reboot it.

CreatePackage.name: CreatePackage
CreatePackage.documentation: Creates a package and storage location in an Amazon S3 access point.

DeletePackage.name: DeletePackage
DeletePackage.documentation:
Deletes a package.

To delete a package, you need permission to call s3:DeleteObject in addition to permissions for the AWS Panorama API.

DescribeApplicationInstance.name: DescribeApplicationInstance
DescribeApplicationInstance.documentation: Returns information about an application instance on a device.

DescribeApplicationInstanceDetails.name: DescribeApplicationInstanceDetails
DescribeApplicationInstanceDetails.documentation: Returns information about an application instance's configuration manifest.

DescribeNodeFromTemplateJob.name: DescribeNodeFromTemplateJob
DescribeNodeFromTemplateJob.documentation: Returns information about a job to create a camera stream node.

DescribePackageImportJob.name: DescribePackageImportJob
DescribePackageImportJob.documentation: Returns information about a package import job.

ListApplicationInstanceDependencies.name: ListApplicationInstanceDependencies
ListApplicationInstanceDependencies.documentation: Returns a list of application instance dependencies.

ListApplicationInstanceNodeInstances.name: ListApplicationInstanceNodeInstances
ListApplicationInstanceNodeInstances.documentation: Returns a list of application node instances.

ListNodeFromTemplateJobs.name: ListNodeFromTemplateJobs
ListNodeFromTemplateJobs.documentation: Returns a list of camera stream node jobs.

ListPackageImportJobs.name: ListPackageImportJobs
ListPackageImportJobs.documentation: Returns a list of package import jobs.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.documentation: Returns a list of tags for a resource.

ProvisionDevice.name: ProvisionDevice
ProvisionDevice.documentation: Creates a device and returns a configuration archive. The configuration archive is a ZIP file that contains a provisioning certificate that is valid for 5 minutes. Name the configuration archive certificates-omni_device-name.zip and transfer it to the device within 5 minutes. Use the included USB storage device and connect it to the USB 3.0 port next to the HDMI output.

SignalApplicationInstanceNodeInstances.name: SignalApplicationInstanceNodeInstances
SignalApplicationInstanceNodeInstances.documentation: Signal camera nodes to stop or resume.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: The requestor does not have permission to access the target action or resource.

AlternateSoftwareMetadata.documentation: Details about a beta appliance software update.

ErrorArguments.documentation: A list of attributes that led to the exception and their values.

ApplicationInstanceIdToReplace.documentation: The ID of an application instance to replace with the new instance.

RuntimeRoleArn.documentation: The ARN of a runtime role for the application instance.

DeviceJobConfig.documentation: Configuration settings for a software update job.

OutputPackageName.documentation: An output package name for the node.

OutputPackageVersion.documentation: An output package version for the node.

ClientToken.documentation: A client token for the package import job.

InputConfig.documentation: An input config for the package import job.

JobType.documentation: A job type for the package import job.

OutputConfig.documentation: An output config for the package import job.

ForceDelete.documentation: Delete the package even if it has artifacts stored in its access point. Deletes the package's artifacts from Amazon S3.

UpdatedLatestPatchVersion.documentation: If the version was marked latest, the new version to maker as latest.

ApplicationInstanceIdToReplace.documentation: The ID of the application instance that this instance replaced.

DefaultRuntimeContextDevice.documentation: The application instance's default runtime context device.

ApplicationInstanceIdToReplace.documentation: The ID of the application instance that this instance replaced.

ImageVersion.documentation: For an OTA job, the target version of the device software.

AlternateSoftwares.documentation: Beta software releases available for the device.

DeviceAggregatedStatus.documentation: A device's aggregated status. Including the device's connection status, provisioning status, and lease status.

LatestDeviceJob.documentation: A device's latest job. Includes the target image version, and the job status.

LatestSoftware.documentation: The latest software version available for the device.

OwnerAccount.documentation: The account ID of the node's owner.
The account ID of the node's owner.

ReadAccessPrincipalArns.documentation: ARNs of accounts that have read access to the package.

WriteAccessPrincipalArns.documentation: ARNs of accounts that have write access to the package.

IsLatestPatch.documentation: Whether the version is the latest available.

OwnerAccount.documentation: The account ID of the version's owner.

DeviceAggregatedStatus.documentation: A device's aggregated status. Including the device's connection status, provisioning status, and lease status.

LatestDeviceJob.documentation: A device's latest job. Includes the target image version, and the update job status.

DeviceJob.documentation: A job that runs on a device.

OTAJobConfig.documentation: A configuration for an over-the-air (OTA) upgrade. Required for OTA jobs.

ConnectionType.documentation: How the device gets an IP address.

StaticIpConnectionInfo.documentation: Network configuration for a static IP connection.

RetryAfterSeconds.documentation: The number of seconds a client should wait before retrying the call.

ImageVersion.documentation: The target version of the device software.

LatestDeviceJob.documentation: Returns information about the latest device job.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of application instance dependencies to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.
A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of node instances to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.
A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of application instances to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

StatusFilter.documentation: Only include instances with a specific status.

NextToken.documentation: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

DeviceId.documentation: Filter results by the job's target device ID.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of device jobs to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.
A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of devices to return in one page of results.

NameFilter.documentation: Filter based on device's name. Prefixes supported.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

SortBy.documentation: The target column to be sorted on. Default column sort is CREATED_TIME.

SortOrder.documentation: The sorting order for the returned list. SortOrder is DESCENDING by default based on CREATED_TIME. Otherwise, SortOrder is ASCENDING.

NextToken.documentation: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of node from template jobs to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.
A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of nodes to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

OwnerAccount.documentation: Search for nodes by the account ID of the nodes' owner.

NextToken.documentation: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of package import jobs to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.
A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

MaxResults.documentation: The maximum number of packages to return in one page of results.

NextToken.documentation: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.
A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

ManifestOverridesPayload.documentation: Parameter overrides for an application instance. This is a JSON document that has a single key (PayloadData) where the value is an escaped string representation of the overrides document.

ManifestPayload.documentation: A application verion's manifest file. This is a JSON document that has a single key (PayloadData) where the value is an escaped string representation of the application manifest (graph.json). This file is located in the graphs folder in your application source.

NtpStatus.documentation: Details about a network time protocol (NTP) server connection.

OwnerAccount.documentation: The account ID of the node's owner.

Node.documentation: An application node that represents a camera stream, a model, code, or output.

NodeFromTemplateJob.documentation: A job to create a camera stream node.

NodeInstanceId.documentation: The camera node's name, from the application manifest.

NodeSignal.documentation: A signal to a camera node to start or stop processing video.

NtpServers.documentation: NTP servers to use, in order of preference.

NtpPayload.documentation: Network time protocol (NTP) server settings. Use this option to connect to local NTP servers instead of pool.ntp.org.

AllowMajorVersionUpdate.documentation: Whether to apply the update if it is a major version change.

ImageVersion.documentation: The target version of the device software.

OutPutS3Location.documentation: The location of an output object in Amazon S3.

PackageImportJob.documentation: A job to import a package version.

PackageImportJobInputConfig.documentation: A configuration for a package import job.

PackageImportJobOutputConfig.documentation: An output configuration for a package import job.

MarkLatest.documentation: Indicates that the version is recommended for all users.
Whether to mark the new version as the latest version.

DeviceReportedTime.documentation: When the device reported the application's state.

ServiceQuotaExceededException.documentation: The request would cause a limit to be exceeded.

ErrorArguments.documentation: A list of attributes that led to the exception and their values.

Fields.documentation: A list of request parameters that failed validation.

ValidationException.documentation: The request contains an invalid parameter value.

documentation:
AWS Panorama

Overview

This is the AWS Panorama API Reference. For an introduction to the service, see What is AWS Panorama? in the AWS Panorama Developer Guide.
